page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN BULKINGTON
page.content: Bulkington is mainly a farming village employing family workers. Campbell- Gray is a plant hire company employing approximately 8 people, including secretaries, truck and lorry drivers, mechanics and a manager. Roundstone Catering supplies different organisations, including restaurants and hotels with items such as cookers, vending machines, and general equipment used in the catering trade. It employs around 5 people. There are 2 builders in the village, together employing 5 regular workers, but sub- contracting labour for larger work (eg the building of houses). About 60% of the local inhabitants work outside the village and there is a very low incidence of unemployment. About 10 retired people live in Bulkington.
